items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Walker Tape®’s Hard Bond Remover is made for accidents involving hard bond adhesives.">
items.storedetaileddescription:
Walker Tape®’s Hard Bond Remover is made for accidents involving hard bond adhesives. It is made to quickly remove hard bond adhesives in case of misapplication on the skin or system. Hard Bond Remover is for emergency use only and is not intended for full system removal, removing systems once glue has dried. Only for immediate mistakes, misapplications, and emergencies.

It must be used right away, not after the hard bond glue has dried. This does not work as a unit remover and will damage the hair system if used this way.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Flammable – Do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame.
Use in a well-ventilated area.
Close lid tightly.
Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin.
External use only, do not ingest.
Avoid eye contact.
Keep out of reach of children.
Test on a small area before use.
Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F).
Contains acetone.
If swallowed, seek medical attention.
items.displayname: Hard Bond Remover - 4 fl oz, Drip-Top
items.storedisplayname2: Hard Bond Remover - 4 fl oz, Drip-Top
items.storedescription:
Apply the remover and saturate the area where hard bond has been applied.

Not intended for full system removal, removing systems once glue has dried. Only for immediate mistakes, misapplications, and emergencies.
items.pagetitle: Hard Bond Remover - 4 fl oz, Drip-Top | Walker Tape
